verses.kjv: Behold, a king shall reign in righteousness, and princes shall rule in judgment.
verses.ct: Look — a king will rule with righteousness, and leaders will govern with justice.

verses.kjv: And a man shall be as an hiding place from the wind, and a covert from the tempest; as rivers of water in a dry place, as the shadow of a great rock in a weary land.
verses.ct: Each one will be like a shelter from the wind, a refuge from the storm, like streams of water in a desert, like the shade of a massive rock in an exhausted land.

verses.kjv: And the eyes of them that see shall not be dim, and the ears of them that hear shall hearken.
verses.ct: The eyes of those who can see will no longer be clouded, and the ears of those who can hear will truly listen.

verses.kjv: The heart also of the rash shall understand knowledge, and the tongue of the stammerers shall be ready to speak plainly.
verses.ct: The minds of the impulsive will gain understanding, and those who stutter will speak clearly and fluently.

verses.kjv: The vile person shall be no more called liberal, nor the churl said to be bountiful.
verses.ct: Fools will no longer be called noble, and the greedy will no longer be considered generous.

verses.kjv: For the vile person will speak villany, and his heart will work iniquity, to practise hypocrisy, and to utter error against the LORD, to make empty the soul of the hungry, and he will cause the drink of the thirsty to fail.
verses.ct: Because a fool speaks wickedness, and his mind plots evil. He practices ungodliness and spreads lies about the LORD. He leaves the hungry with nothing to eat and takes away water from the thirsty.

verses.kjv: The instruments also of the churl are evil: he deviseth wicked devices to destroy the poor with lying words, even when the needy speaketh right.
verses.ct: The methods of the greedy person are cruel — he schemes up wicked plans to ruin the poor with lies, even when the needy person's case is legitimate.

verses.kjv: But the liberal deviseth liberal things; and by liberal things shall he stand.
verses.ct: But a generous person makes generous plans, and by generous actions he will stand firm.

verses.kjv: Rise up, ye women that are at ease; hear my voice, ye careless daughters; give ear unto my speech.
verses.ct: Stand up, you comfortable women! Listen to what I'm saying, you carefree daughters! Pay attention to my words.

verses.kjv: Many days and years shall ye be troubled, ye careless women: for the vintage shall fail, the gathering shall not come.
verses.ct: In just over a year, you carefree women will be shaken with distress, because the grape harvest will fail and no crops will be gathered.

verses.kjv: Tremble, ye women that are at ease; be troubled, ye careless ones: strip you, and make you bare, and gird sackcloth upon your loins.
verses.ct: Shudder, you comfortable women! Be distressed, you carefree ones! Strip off your fine clothes, bare yourselves, and wrap rough cloth around your waists.

verses.kjv: They shall lament for the teats, for the pleasant fields, for the fruitful vine.
verses.ct: Beat your chests in mourning for the beautiful fields and the fruitful vineyards.

verses.kjv: Upon the land of my people shall come up thorns and briers; yea, upon all the houses of joy in the joyous city:
verses.ct: Thorns and weeds will overtake the land of my people — yes, covering every joyful home in this celebrating city.

verses.kjv: Because the palaces shall be forsaken; the multitude of the city shall be left; the forts and towers shall be for dens for ever, a joy of wild asses, a pasture of flocks;
verses.ct: The palace will be abandoned, the bustling city deserted. The fortified hills and watchtowers will become dens forever — a playground for wild donkeys, a grazing ground for flocks.

verses.kjv: Until the spirit be poured upon us from on high, and the wilderness be a fruitful field, and the fruitful field be counted for a forest.
verses.ct: This will last until the Spirit is poured out on us from above, and the wilderness becomes a fertile field, and the fertile field is as thick as a forest.

verses.kjv: Then judgment shall dwell in the wilderness, and righteousness remain in the fruitful field.
verses.ct: Then justice will settle in the wilderness, and righteousness will remain in the fertile field.

verses.kjv: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.
verses.ct: The result of righteousness will be peace, and the fruit of righteousness will be lasting calm and security.

verses.kjv: And my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation, and in sure dwellings, and in quiet resting places;
verses.ct: My people will live in peaceful homes, in safe dwellings, and in undisturbed places of rest.

verses.kjv: When it shall hail, coming down on the forest; and the city shall be low in a low place.
verses.ct: Even when hail flattens the forest and the city is completely leveled,

verses.kjv: Blessed are ye that sow beside all waters, that send forth thither the feet of the ox and the ass.
verses.ct: how blessed you will be — sowing your seeds along every stream, letting your oxen and donkeys roam freely.
